The 2000 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2000 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2000) was held on 16 May 2000, at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Nelson Motta and Fernanda Torres hosted the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
Nominees for each award are listed below; winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
